page.title: 11Churchyard Poem.
page.content:
The churchyard is a dormant garden. The graves show that man has been here. It reminds me of a different world, Gives me a feeling of lonliness. Really there are people surrounding you,everywhere. You're not alone,the graves are there, For the remembrance of others, And they are very close to you.
There are dark colours that make you feel that all the world has lost its brightness. Its like a wood with only a few trees, All the graves bending and twisting. It gives me the feelings of a planet, Far away from us,not an alien world, But a place where our kind live. A strangely lived existence,full of mishappenings and dark futures.
